title: ReactJS Leads
description:
Strong coding experience in JavaScript and the reactJS ecosystem

Experience building react web applications with frameworks such as NextJS and
gatsbyJS

Experience with react charting libraries such ReCharts, D3.js etc

Ability to independently develop large features using best coding practices with
minimum supervision

Have a good understanding of Git, Github and the CI/CD process from the code
development point of view


QUALIFICATIONS
